pkgmetadata.longdescription: Composed permissions for django-rest-framework----------------------------------------------A simple way to define complex permissions for django-rest-framework.- **Documentation:** https://djangorestframework-composed-permissions.readthedocs.org/en/latest/Development-----------Run tests with our settings using the following command:``django-admin test restfw_composed_permissions --settings=restfw_composed_permissions.tests.settings_sqlite``License-------New BSD License
